summary: New MCM menu that features many options
descriptionHtml:
New MCM Menu that includes many options
Features included:
-Changing FOV options
-Force Enable Player controls
-Mana Shield Spell/Enchantments(Uses FavorsTimer Variable to store mana shield total)
-Transformation Trinkets from my Transformation Trinkets mod
-Divide Enchantment Options from my Divide Enchantments mod
-New Unfinished Transformation Spells
-Force End of Werewolf Transformation option
-Some other things such as new perks in menu to use

-Also includes unfinished optional patcher that(will later have options correctly turn on/off features after I figure out how to make working option sliders):
- turns Unplayable Weapons/Armor into playable equipment(exclusions to formids with name FXarmor, Skin, and Names of \\\\\\\"\\\\\\\", \\\\\\\"<No Text>\\\\\\\")
-Flips swim flags to allow combat in water(needs custom idle tree to allow player to attack in water)
-Limit max potion weight to 2.0
-ManaShield effects distributed between actors of certain classes(Doesn\'t work)

-Requires:
Latest SKSE
Latest SkyUI
Dawnguard

Information for TrinketsMod thats fused into mod:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16026

Changes in 1.01 Alpha(Unreleased):
-Turn on/off trinket recipes
-Option to turn on new trinket recipes instead of old versions of them
-New optional esp for creature idle tree patch to allow player attacks without needing to rely on using room esp for player compatible creature attacking(still requires nif changes)
-Nif patch for gargolye to allow player camera to work on gargolye(based on room\'s author instructions)
author: BlazesRus
